title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 606/92 of 10 March 1992 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1570/77 on price increases and reductions applicable to intervention in cereals
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 606/92  of 10 March 1992  amending Regulation (EEC) No 1570/77 on price increases and reductions applicable to intervention in cereals
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Article 4 (6) of Regulation (EEC) No 1570/77 is hereby repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 March 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 281, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 353, 17. 12. 1990, p. 23. (3) OJ No L 174, 14. 7. 1977, p. 18. (4) OJ No L 208, 30. 7. 1987, p. 10.
